response.explain: The previous action code has successfully closed the fridge. Now, we need to check if the apple and strawberry are frozen.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the apple.
(4) Move the robot to the fridge.
(5) Put the apple inside the fridge.
(6) Move the robot to the tray.
(7) Grasp the strawberry from the tray.
(8) Move the robot to the fridge.
(9) Put the strawberry inside the fridge.
(10) Close the fridge.
(11) Wait for a while to let the apple and strawberry freeze.
(12) Open the fridge.
(13) Check if the apple and strawberry are frozen.
